entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Pinawa
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:31 p.m. CDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning early in the evening. Amount 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 3 April 2023
